# .center[Background]
<br>
### Campaign costs have accelerated rapidly
<br>
### Record number of candidates to keep track of this cycle
<br>
### Competition for stories fiercer than ever


---

# .center[What We Needed]
<br>
### Capability to track and analyze campaign reports in real time as they are filed with the FEC

### Ability to see summary-level comparisons of the candidates instantly

### Capacity to do quick-turnaround deadline and innovative analysis

### Power to fuel data visualizations for digital and broadcast


---

# .center[What We've Built]
<br>
### Relational database updated in real time to pull in and parse into clean data columns the presidential, congressional and PAC reports 
<br>
### Easy-to-use website for CNN staffers to pull interactive results on deadline


---

# .center[How We've Built It]
<br>
### Created a cross-functional team consisting of editorial, engineering, development and design folks
<br>
### Contracted a subject-matter expert in FEC data and backend development, Alex Cohen, to build the database and accompanying tool
<br>
### Leveraged existing CNN internal cloud computing resources to host and deploy the results
